title: Account hacked, permabanned. Support won't do anything
body:
So, happy fun times for me.  Tried to log in for the first time in a few years. My account had been permabanned for use of third party programs. Great, so I went to support, explained the situation to them. "You were using 3rd party programs and were banned as a result." Tried to explain that's impossible as my computer had died, and I was at work during my most recent games. "Nope, still banned. No compromise has been found."

Now here is where things get juicy. I managed to get my account data and noticed a few strange things. Namely logins from south Australia, china and Vietnam. Now for a little bit of background info: I live in victoria. I've never been to China or Vietnam.
Can someone please explain to me how these logins are considered "no suspicious acitivity"?

Thank you
